name: Tiger Tank
description:
This is a WWII themed tank battle game.Players need to operate the tank skillfully, reasonable card position, destroy all the enemies in order to win.

Tanks in the game are all well-known models in World War II, include: Light tank, Tank Destoryer, Medium tank, Heavy tank 4 types.There are more than 40 tanks to choose from, each with its own strengths and weaknesses that players need to learn in real combat.
